it s great fun.
i aspire to paint murals.

content.text: What are your hobbies?
I enjoy painting murals, I think it's a great way to express my creativity.
That sounds fun! I've always wanted to try my hand at painting, but I'm not very artistic.
I'm sure you'd be great at it! You can always learn how to do something, it just takes a little practice.
I'm not sure I have the patience for it, but I could try.
It's definitely worth a try! You never know, you might find you're really good at it.
Well, maybe I'll give it a shot. In the meantime, I'll just admire your work.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a student right now, but I'm hoping to become a professional painter one day.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be successful.
Thanks, I hope so!
So, what are you worried about with your upcoming exams?
Mostly just passing them. I'm not a very good test taker.
I know what you mean. I'm not either. But you'll do fine, I'm sure.
Thanks for the vote of confidence.
No problem! What are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm just going to take it one step at a time.
That's a good plan. Just focus on your studies and the rest will fall into place.
Thanks, I'll try.
